snippet: Our Lady of Charity, Cuba’s patron saint, plays a central role in the lives of Cubans, and in the lives of many Miami residents, as well.
abstract: Thousands of Cuban exiles gather in Miami for 400th anniversary celebration of La Virgen de La Caridad, or Our Lady of Charity, the patron saint of Cuba; La Virgen plays a key role in the lives of Catholics in Cuba, and of many Miami residents as well.
lead_paragraph: Our Lady of Charity, Cuba’s patron saint, plays a central role in the lives of Cubans, and in the lives of many Miami residents, as well.

headline.seo: La Virgen de la Caridad Anniversary Celebrated in Miami
headline.main: 400 Years Later, Still Revered in Cuba (and Miami)
headline.print_headline: 400 Years Later, Still Revered in Cuba (and Miami)
